item.title: add
item.description: add by POI Developers - Initial XWPFStyles support for working with default document paragraph and run styles

item.title: fix(bug 57889)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57889) - Fix potential NPE in XWPFParagraph.getNumFmt()

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - If an empty file or stream is given to WorkbookFactory.create, give a more informative exception - EmptyFileException

item.title: fix(bug 57552)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57552) - Sort PackagePart returns from OPCPackage by name considering numbers in filenames, so Image10.png comes after Image9.png, fixing problems with XSLF adding 10+ images to a slide

item.title: fix(bug 57880)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57880) - Handle >32,767 cell styles and formats in XSSF (file format limit is 64,000)

item.title: add(bug 57593)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57593) - Allow WorkbookFactory.create methods to open xlsx files protected with the default password

item.title: add(bug 57593)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57593) - Add overloaded WorkbookFactory.create methods which take the spreadsheet password

item.title: fix(bug 57666)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57666) - When removing a SXSSF sheet, ensure temp files associated with it are disposed of

item.title: fix(bug 57826)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57826) - If a XSSF shape has a buFont but no bullet character, mirror Excel and treat as un-bulleted

item.title: fix(bug 57642)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57642) - Fix setSheetName with ISERROR on XSSF

item.title: add(bug 57747)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57747) - Add ISERR() function

item.title: fix(bug 57829)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57829) - Avoid XmlValueDisconnectedException when removing a XWPFRun from a XWPFParagraph by removing from IRuns as well

item.title: fix(bug 57851)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57851) - Skip null properties in PropertyTableBase, which is how PropertyFactory reports unsupported POIFS properties

item.title: fix(bug 57820)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57820) - Avoid NPE on HSLF Tables with a top position of -1

item.title: fix(bug 56579)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56579) - Throw exception if max string length of 32767 chars is exceeded in XSSF and SXSSF.

item.title: fix(bug 55386)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 55386) - Fix handling of bold formatting in example application 'ToHtml'

item.title: fix(bug 47304)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 47304) - Use fixed encoding when extracting text in WordDocument

item.title: fix(bug 56017)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56017) - Fix shifting comments with shifted rows

item.title: fix(bug 56295)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56295) - Fix cloning of styles across workbooks and handling of default value of attribute applyFill

item.title: fix(bug 56380)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56380) - Remove limitation of 1024 comments per Workbook

item.title: fix(bug 56467)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56467) - Fix cloning of sheets with pictures

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI Developers - More helpful ExtractorFactory exception if given a Visio VSDX ooxml file

item.title: fix(bug 56799)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56799) - Include CTTblGrid in the smaller poi-ooxml-schemas jar

item.title: fix(bug 57165)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57165) - Avoid PartAlreadyExistsException when removing/cloning sheets

item.title: fix(bug 56893)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56893) - Additional check for supported string-length to avoid creating broken XLS files later one

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - When saving an OPCPackage with no Core Properties (eg from Jasper Reports), ensure they are always added even if not yet used

item.title: fix(bug github-18)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug github-18) - Handle documents with a picture-only header

item.title: fix(bug 57622)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57622) - Change from XMLEventFactory.newFactory to XMLEventFactory.newInstance, for IBM JDK Compatibility
